department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on April 20, 2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of The National Research Council of Canada (NRC), is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition, delivery and installation of a High Free Volume Twin-Screw Extrude located in Boucherville, Québec, Canada), as detailed in Annex A.
